name: Colt Hercules (Pre-Alpha) 0.11
description:
COLT HERCULES

Play as private detective Colt Hercules as he investigates the murder of an heiress' father. Defeat all 8 bosses to earn upgrades and unlock them as a playable character for player 2!

This is very much a WIP and what I have uploaded now is a proof of concept. If you would like me to continue working on the game then please leave some feedback. I will be updating until this level is 100% complete and then work on the rest if people seem to like it.

If you do like it, I would prefer you share it with your friends rather than donate :)

CONTROLS
KeyboardControllerSelectJFace Button 1/StartBackKFace Button 2/SelectPauseEnterStartJumpSpaceFace Button 1ShootJFace Button 3InteractKFace Button 4PauseEnterStartCheckpointPN/A WHAT'S NEXT?
